amendment.description: To address research and development efforts for purposes of small business research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2531 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12780-12781) To address research and development efforts for purposes of small business research.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
